mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mission (content, min_m, max_m, min_w, max_w) VALUES (#{content}, #{maleMin}, #{maleMax}, #{femaleMin},#{femaleMax});
mapper.update: UPDATE mission SET content = #{content}, min_m = #{maleMin}, max_m = #{maleMax}, min_w = #{femaleMin}, max_w = #{femaleMax} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id , content, min_m as maleMin, max_m as maleMax, min_w as femaleMin, max_w as femaleMax FROM mission;
